title: Game-breaking Bug

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Glitch 2 special characters into a player's in-game name. (2 uses, 2 night cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player is told they are Bugged.
- Bugged players cannot: vote, be voted for, whisper, be whispered to, use factional kills, or die. It is like they do not exist in the game.
- Bugged players can still: talk in daychat, talk in factional chat, talk in private chats, and use their ability on players except themselves.
- If a player attempts to target a Bugged player during the day or night, they are immediately told their target does not exist.
- Bugged players alter the game as if they do not exist. Reducing majority votes, and not affecting win conditions.
- Any previous instances of the player's name, including meta channels like info and announcement channels, are changed to the Bugged name.
